name: mongo-scraper
description: ## Overview An app that scrapes articles from the New York Times website and lets users save articles and leave comments on the latest news. Scrape articles by clicking the "Scrape Articles" button. Once articles are loaded, read full article by clicking the link in each article's panel and save articles by clicking the "Save Article" button. Saved articles can be viewed at the "Saved Articles" page. Comments can be added on saved articles by clicking the "Add a Note" button. Saved articles can be deleted by clicking the "Delete" button.
